Title: Publishable packaging & release prep

Body:
What: Finalize `Cargo.toml` metadata, add `CHANGELOG.md`, and document release steps.

Why: Prepare the crate for publishing and clear release process.

Acceptance criteria:
- `Cargo.toml` contains description, license, authors, repository, homepage, categories.
- `CHANGELOG.md` contains an initial entry.
- `RELEASE.md` or `CONTRIBUTING.md` describes how to cut a release.

Estimate: 1 day
